name: BeLost
description:
BeLost is a 2D Pixel Art survival game. It is currently in development. You can buy it and play the beta right now!

Good luck exploring the plains, beaches, swamps, deserts, jungles, and all the mysteries of BeLost!

You can comment your opinion about BeLost in the comments section, any input or bug report will be extremely helpful.

Thank you very much for visiting this page!
